compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation - A regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy.

requirements.requirement: Obtain explicit consent from users before processing their personal data.
requirements.evidence: User consent mechanisms are in place but need enhancements.
gaps: Lack of clear consent management tools.
recommendations: Implement a robust consent management system.

requirements.requirement: Ensure data subject rights are respected (access, rectification, erasure).
requirements.evidence: No mechanisms for users to exercise their rights.
gaps: Absence of user interfaces for data access and deletion.
recommendations: Develop user interfaces for data subject rights.

requirements.requirement: Implement data protection by design and by default.
requirements.evidence: Some data protection measures are implemented.
gaps: Limited integration of privacy considerations in development processes.
recommendations: Integrate privacy considerations into the development lifecycle.

critical_gaps: Lack of mechanisms for users to exercise their data rights.
remediation_plan: Implement a consent management system to track user consent.
Develop user interfaces for data subject rights.
Integrate privacy by design principles into the development process.
